Do you know that..\nto avoid any annoyance to the receiver, only one sms per campaign will be send though Columba to him!\nTherefore, if two users try to forward a campaign to the same person, only the first one will send the SMS.

Tap here to follow an association and enable push notifications for every new association\'s campaigns
Tap here to TRUST an association and enable the auto-spreading of every new association\'s campaigns! (You have to select manually the contacts that will be reached by SMSs)
